languages.text: {n}Соприкосновение разумов — не метафора. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}Дар{/d} явственно говорит, что ваши разумы связала психическая связь. Связь, подпитываемая с обеих сторон.{/n}

{n}This is not some metaphor. Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}gift{/d} makes it clear that your and Kibellah's minds now share a psychic connection, one that both of you are helping to sustain.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Соприкосновение разумов — не метафора. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}Дар{/d} явственно говорит, что ваши разумы связала психическая связь. Связь, подпитываемая с обеих сторон.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das ist nicht irgendeine Metapher. Deine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}Gabe{/d} sagt dir, dass dein Geist nun mit Kibellahs Verstand verbunden ist und euch dieses psionische Band durchhalten lässt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This is not some metaphor. Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}gift{/d} makes it clear that your and Kibellah's minds now share a psychic connection, one that both of you are helping to sustain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das ist nicht irgendeine Metapher. Deine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}Gabe{/d} sagt dir, dass dein Geist nun mit Kibellahs Verstand verbunden ist und euch dieses psionische Band durchhalten lässt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il ne s'agit pas d'une quelconque métaphore. Votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}don{/d} vous confirme que vous partagez à présent un lien psychique avec Kibellah, un lien que vous contribuez {mf|tous|toutes} deux à maintenir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This is not some metaphor. Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}gift{/d} makes it clear that your and Kibellah's minds now share a psychic connection, one that both of you are helping to sustain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il ne s'agit pas d'une quelconque métaphore. Votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}don{/d} vous confirme que vous partagez à présent un lien psychique avec Kibellah, un lien que vous contribuez {mf|tous|toutes} deux à maintenir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Esto no es ninguna metáfora. Tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}don{/d} revela claramente que tu mente y la de Kibellah están unidas por un vínculo psíquico sustentado por ambas partes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This is not some metaphor. Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}gift{/d} makes it clear that your and Kibellah's minds now share a psychic connection, one that both of you are helping to sustain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Esto no es ninguna metáfora. Tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}don{/d} revela claramente que tu mente y la de Kibellah están unidas por un vínculo psíquico sustentado por ambas partes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}これは比喩などではない。あなたの{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}恩寵{/d}により、あなたとキベラの心が精神的なつながりを共有していることを、そしてそれを維持しようと双方が普請していることがはっきりとわかる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This is not some metaphor. Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}gift{/d} makes it clear that your and Kibellah's minds now share a psychic connection, one that both of you are helping to sustain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}これは比喩などではない。あなたの{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}恩寵{/d}により、あなたとキベラの心が精神的なつながりを共有していることを、そしてそれを維持しようと双方が普請していることがはっきりとわかる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}这并不是什么隐喻，你的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}天赋{/d}让你清楚地看到，你与绮贝菈的意识之间存在着某种灵能联结，你们两人都在协力维持着这种联结。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This is not some metaphor. Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}gift{/d} makes it clear that your and Kibellah's minds now share a psychic connection, one that both of you are helping to sustain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这并不是什么隐喻，你的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}天赋{/d}让你清楚地看到，你与绮贝菈的意识之间存在着某种灵能联结，你们两人都在协力维持着这种联结。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu bir metafor değil. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}Yeteneğin{/d}, Kibellah ile zihinlerinizin artık bir ruhsezi bağlantısı paylaştığını açıklığa kavuşturuyor. Her ikinizin birden sürdürmeye katkıda bulunduğu bir bağlantı bu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This is not some metaphor. Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}gift{/d} makes it clear that your and Kibellah's minds now share a psychic connection, one that both of you are helping to sustain.{/n}
